name: DebugPlot

description.en: Plot a line on Y using a value between [0.0, 1.0].
description.zh: 根据输入值在 Y 轴方向上绘制调试用线条。

main: float pct = smoothstep(Input - u_lineWidth, Input, 1.0 - v_uv0.y) - smoothstep(Input, Input + u_lineWidth, 1.0 - v_uv0.y);
return vec4((1.0 - pct) * vec3(Input) + pct * u_lineColor.rgb, 1.0);
